data.title: FabFilter Featured Artist
data.meta_description: FabFilter featured artist Tom Elmhirst about working with FabFilter plug-ins.
data.text:
Tom Elmhirst is a multi Grammy Award-winning mix engineer. Elmhirst’s experiences at SARM studios and with Trevor Horn have clearly influenced his current workflow. Toms most notable recent works include artists such as Amy Winehouse, Adele, David Bowie, Beck, Frank Ocean, Florence and the Machine, Arcade Fire, U2, Norah Jones, etc.

After working at Metropolis Studios for over 10 years, Tom now calls Electric Lady Studios in the heart of Greenwich Village in NYC his home. Tom still works on a large format Neve VR console, but his workflow has continuously evolved utilizing both the analog and digital domains.

Tom Elmhirst and FabFilter

"Word spreads quick about a great product. I use the Pro-Q 2 on every mix. It makes curves no other EQ can. The Q allows me to get extremely surgical, which is perfect for taming a harsh vocal, and its nice to be able to see the spectrum while making eq decisions."
